question.text: Read the following statements. Which one of the following is incorrect?

options.text: GAATTC is the recognition site of EcoRI.
Agrobacterium tumefaciens is used for cloning genes in plants.
In the restriction enzyme EcoRI, "co" stands for coenzyme.
For transformation, micro-particles coated with DNA to be bombarded with gene gun are made up of gold or tungsten.

solution.text:
Restriction enzymes are named after the organism from which it has been isolated. First letter of genus and first two letters of species plus the order of endonuclease in which it was discovered from the bacterial strain.

Eco - Escherichia coli, R - Strain RY13, I - First endonuclease isolated from this strain.
